| HistoryText             = [[Daimon Hellstrom (Earth-616)|Hellstorm]], [[Margali Szardos (Earth-616)|Szardos]], [[Alyssa Moy (Earth-616)|Moy]], and the [[Mechamage (Earth-616)|Mechamage]] agreed to remain together to defend the Earth against demonic threats, calling themselves the Shadow Hunters.
